name: Stone soul
description:
You must putting together strange creatures.

Controll

R - restart 
LMB - blast 
RMB - take inactive creature / steal energy from active

Creatures
  • Inactive You can take them by pressing RMB and put them together, after which they will become active.
  • Active You can steal energy from them by pressing RMB, but if you steal all the energy, the creature dies.
  • Aggressive Can spawn if there are more than two creatures nearby. Attacks you. Shoot them to kill them.
  • Mourn Appears when you kill a creature next to it. Can steal energy from you. You can't kill them. To avoid them, don't steal all the energy when there are only two creatures together.
